item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Manuel Martinez and I am a Research Analyst at Yale’s Tobin Center for Economic Policy for Yale’s Assistant Professor of Economics John Eric Humphries, and also for Princeton’s Assistant Professor of Economics and Public Affairs Christopher Neilson. I also work as a data scientist for ConsiliumBots, an NGO that leverages economic theory and technology to make navigation in education markets easier for families and students.
